name: SusunJadwal
description: With over 200k annual users and a strong cult of community, SusunJadwal has been the #1 app for helping students across the University of Indonesia to plan courses and share schedules.

name: RISTEK.LINK
description: The easiest customizable url shortener, ever.

name: UlasKelas
description: Ever had a hard time getting information on courses you want to take? Fret no more, UlasKelas is a mobile application to help students learn about the courses they can take
